lead_paragraph: Manchester City's out-of-favour goalkeeper Joe Hart is keen to join Serie A club Torino on a season-long loan deal, media reports said on Monday.

headline.print_headline: City Keeper Hart Wants to Join Torino on Loan-Reports
headline.main: City Keeper Hart Wants to Join Torino on Loan-Reports

snippet: Manchester City's out-of-favour goalkeeper Joe Hart is keen to join Serie A club Torino on a season-long loan deal, media reports said on Monday....
